name: Cap Cap：Catch The Rhythm
description:
Welcome to our soda factory! We have all kinds of fruit soda that you can ever imagine, and now it's time to cap the soda bottles before shipping them to the world!

How to play:
>Listen to those adorable fruits firstly, they will shout out the rhythm for you!
>Catch the rhythm and cap the bottles!

Tips:
>Sometimes the bottle is empty, you need to hold down to fill it up.
>You may face some unexpected challenges while you're capping, what can I say, we're naughty!

That's it. Go ahead and have fun!
